ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
